text:
We gather, process and store your personal data for the following purposes: As part of the improvement of our Application, we may also gather your connection data in order to draw conclusions from it and improve the user experience and the overall ergonomics of our Application.
When you access the Application, we gather your connection data, i.e. information that is automatically recorded by our servers when you access the Application or when you use it, whether or not you are registered as a member of the Application.

Our Application uses cookies that enable us for instance to obtain information concerning your use of and access to our Application.
The Application uses mainly cookies provided by Google Analytics, a web analysis service provided by Google Inc., which uses proprietary cookies designed to analyze the logs of user interactions with the Application.
The Application's use of cookies : Advertising cookies: finally, our Application uses cookies to serve you personalized advertisements within our Application.
The Application's use of cookies : Audience measurement cookies: we also use cookies in order to measure the audience of our Application.

collector: body give you permission use application
text: As pointed out previously, the enterprise and/or the body that gave you permission to use the Application will also have access to your personal data.

As pointed out previously, the enterprise and/or the body that gave you permission to use the Application will also have access to your personal data.
This enterprise can thus gather your personal data via the Application, for its own purposes, in its capacity as data controller.

We may moreover have to share your personal data in the following situations: Your personal data may also be disclosed where need be to the police (pursuant to a court warrant) or to any person who is legally empowered to receive this information (pursuant to a court order).

We gather, process and store your personal data for the following purposes: As previously indicated, we also process your personal data linked to your organisation and/or participation in the events published via our Application by the enterprise or body that gave you permission to use our Application on behalf of that entity.
We gather, process and store your personal data for the following purposes: For the purposes of appropriate administration of the Application, we may also gather your personal data in order to send you email concerning your registration on the Application, newsletters, technical notifications, updates, security alerts.
We gather, process and store your personal data for the following purposes: Your personal data may also be used for marketing and/or advertising purposes.
We may moreover have to share your personal data in the following situations: Your personal data may be transmitted to our hosting company in Europe if you access our Application from the European Union, or in the United States if you access our Application from the United States.
